# Scrape MiLB game logs for pitchers from Fangraphs, combining 'standard' and 'advanced' tabs

Source: R/milb_pitcher_game_logs_fg.R
milb_pitcher_game_logs_fg.Rd

This function allows you to scrape MiLB game logs for individual batters from FanGraphs.com.

milb_pitcher_game_logs_fg(playerid, year = 2017)

Arguments

playerid

The pitcher's minor leauge ID from FanGraphs.com.
year

The season for which game logs should be returned.

Examples

milb_pitcher_game_logs_fg(playerid = "sa3004210", year=2017)
#> Data courtey of FanGraphs.com. Please consider supporting FanGraphs by purchasing a membership: https://plus.fangraphs.com/product/fangraphs-membership/?switch-subscription=254671&item=85029&_wcsnonce=3e893e9b53&auto-switch=true
#>      player_name minor_playerid       Date Team Level  Opp W L       ERA G GS
#> 2  Riley O'Brien      sa3004210 2017-08-26  TBR   (R)  STL 1 0  0.000000 1  1

#> 5  Riley O'Brien      sa3004210 2017-08-08  TBR   (R)  NYY 0 0  0.000000 1  1
#> 6  Riley O'Brien      sa3004210 2017-08-01  TBR   (R) @TOR 0 0  0.000000 1  1
